A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I thought that this was a fantastic departure from your standard Star Wars fare. The twists within the movie were done brilliantly\, culminating in a story that essentially gives the entire universe a clean slate to move forward.

While I think that the casino planet story line could have been tightened a bit\, I think the addition of Rose to the group is a strong one.

I can also see where Mark Hamill came from with his disagreement of the character direction. With that in mind I think that his performance is just brilliant\, and the ending of this phase of Luke's story is exceptionally handled.
